title: The Top 6 Biggest Flirts of the Zodiac: Astrologers Weigh In

steps.title: Leo is very friendly and a natural flirt.
steps.content: Leo is very friendly and a natural flirt. They're a fire sign which means they're really passionate. Since Leo's ruled by the sun they've also got a lot of confidence, so they're ready to put themselves out there and make a move. It's no surprise that you're probably drawn to their warm, larger-than-life personality. Their confidence is infectious! Signs that they're flirting with you: They're not afraid of public displays of affection. They single you out of a crowd. They compliment you a lot. They shower you with gifts. Love astrology? Take this quiz to discover your soulmate’s sign.

steps.title: Gemini is a clever flirt who loves to be witty.
steps.content: Gemini is a clever flirt who loves to be witty. They're an air sign which means they're intellectually driven. Gemini is also a fantastic communicator and a complete social butterfly. [1] X Research source Their confidence and easy way of speaking may be what attracted you to them in the first place. Signs that they're flirting with you: They send you frequent text messages. They want to talk with you about everything. They tease you with suggestive comments. They initiate physical contact like holding hands or massaging your shoulders.

steps.title: Libra is an intuitive and approachable flirt.
steps.content: Libra is an intuitive and approachable flirt. They're ruled by Venus, the planet of love, so flirting comes so naturally that they may not even realize they're doing it! Libra is an air sign, which means they'll charm you with their intellect and intuitive nature. It's easy to fall under the charm of their compassionate and thoughtful personality. Signs that they're flirting with you: They dress to impress—their outfit is stylish and thoughtful. They make time for you and want to do things together. They make direct eye contact and give you their full attention. They treat you to big romantic gestures like a candlelit dinner. They find casual ways to touch you like brushing against your shoulder.

steps.title: Aries is a bold, confident flirt.
steps.content: Aries is a bold, confident flirt. This fire sign isn't afraid to tell you how they feel! They're incredibly direct. This is probably because Aries is ruled by Mars, the planet of energy and action. Some might see Aries' flirting style as impulsive, but they just think they're being honest about what they want. Signs that they're flirting with you: They want to spend a lot of time with you or they invite you out. They give you their full attention They tell you exactly what they like about you. They initiate physical contact, like hugs and hand-holding, really quickly. They dress really flashy and bold when they're around you. Reader Poll: We asked 3007 wikiHow readers about how an Aries typically flirts, and only 9% said by flexing their muscles or showing their skin . [Take Poll] So, look for other signs that an Aries is flirting with you back, such as making intense eye contact.

steps.title: Scorpio is a mysterious and passionate flirt.
steps.content: Scorpio is a mysterious and passionate flirt. Scorpio is ruled by Pluto, the planet of depth and sex, so it's no wonder you find them attractive! As the scorpion sign, they might seem like they have a tough exterior, but they're deeply in touch with their emotions, as most water signs are. It's easy for them to get their feelings across, so you know they're interested. [2] X Research source Signs that they're flirting with you: They act protectively around you. They confide in you. They shower you with compliments. They give you their complete attention. They seem possessive of you.

steps.title: Sagittarius is a subtle, but charming flirt.
steps.content: Sagittarius is a subtle, but charming flirt. Sagittarius is a fire sign, which means they're passionate. They're ruled by Jupiter, the planet of expansion and growth, so they'll probably try to impress you by talking about places they've traveled to. Sagittarius might not be as bold or direct as other astrological signs, but they can be intimate and personal when they're interested in someone. Signs that they're flirting with you: They want to spend lots of time with you. They like to be physically close to you. They're romantic—they may surprise you with a love letter or sweet gift. They act playful and might gently tease you. They make plans with you.
